text: Varu, evarinaite viru prarthistu unnaro, vare tama prabhuvu sannidhyanni pondataniki marganni vetukutunnaru. Mariyu varilo ayanaku evaru ekkuva sannidhyam pondutaro ani prayatnistunnaru. Mariyu ayana karunyanni asistunnaru mariyu ayana siksaku bhayapadutunnaru. Niscayanga ni prabhuvu siksa, daniki bhayapada valasinde
